name: Paperboy
overview: A fairly good adaptation of a classic game for the Nintendo Game Boy. Paperboy is a 1984 arcade game by Atari Games. The players take the role of a paperboy who delivers newspapers along a suburban street on his bicycle. The game was ported to numerous video game consoles and personal computers. The Nintendo Entertainment System (NES) version represented the first NES game developed in the United States. Paperboy was innovative for its theme and novel controls.
